title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. P, pt. 201 - Procedural Safeguards For Students With Disabilities Subject To Discipline
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. P, pt. 201 - Procedural Safeguards For Students With Disabilities Subject To Discipline

State Regulations
§ 201.1 - Purpose
§ 201.2 - Definitions
§ 201.3 - Cse responsibilities for functional behavioral assessments and behavioral intervention plans
§ 201.4 - Manifestation determinations
§ 201.5 - Students presumed to have a disability for discipline purposes
§ 201.6 - Cse responsibilities for expedited evaluations
§ 201.7 - General procedures for suspensions and removals of students with disabilities
§ 201.8 - Authority of impartial hearing officer to order a change in placement to an iaes in a dangerous situation
§ 201.9 - Coordination with superintendent's hearing and other due process procedures applicable to all students
§ 201.10 - Provision of services during suspensions
§ 201.11 - Expedited due process hearings

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. P, pt. 201

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 101, 207, 305[1], [2], [20], 3208[1] -[5], 3209[7], 3212, 3214, 3602-c[2], 3713, 4002 [1]-[3], 4308[3], 4355[3], 4401, 4402, 4403, 4404, 4404-a [1]-[7], 4410; L. 1978, ch. 410; L. 1999, chs. 311, 405; L. 2005, chs. 119, 352

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
